name: keythings-monorepo
description: Configuration for AI agents working with KeyThings repository

agentGuidelines.readme: MANDATORY: Read and understand AGENTS.md before performing any actions in this repository.
agentGuidelines.buildProcess: Run 'bun run build' only once after completing implementation, unless there are build errors to fix.
agentGuidelines.devServer: Always use port 3000 for development as the Keeta Wallet extension only works with localhost:3000.
agentGuidelines.architecture: Follow non-custodial architecture principles - backend should never hold user funds or private keys.
agentGuidelines.designSystem: Adhere to the design system standards defined in AGENTS.md, including spacing, colors, and component patterns.
agentGuidelines.security: Follow all security guidelines, especially regarding wallet operations and sensitive data handling.

postResolutionUpdate.format:
## [Date] Issue: [Brief Description]

**Problem:** [Describe the issue]
**Solution:** [Explain the fix]
**Impact:** [How this improves the codebase]
**Prevention:** [How to avoid similar issues]

guidelines: Always use Keeta MCP when implementing or modifying SDK functions
Verify all wallet operations through the MCP layer
Follow the MCP service patterns for consistency
Include proper error handling for MCP interactions
Document any MCP-specific behavior in code comments
